Erlena Chisolm Bland (Jenụwarị 18, 1923 na Febụwarị 16, 2009) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ.

A mụrụ ya na Washington, D.C., Bland gàrà Dunbar High School ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Mahadum Howard; ọ nwetara nzèrè masta na sayensị ọbá akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Maryland, College Park Ọ nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ọbá akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụmụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ pụrụ iche na Goding Elementary School na Washington

O mepụtara nka n'oge ezumike ya, ma mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ gàrà klas na Maryland Institute College of Art, Corcoran School of Art, na Art League na Alexandria, Virginia tupu ọ nweta ụlọ ọrụ. O gosipụtara n'ógbè Washington DC na ebe ndị ọzọ n'oge ọrụ ya, na-egosi ọrụ ya ma n'onwe ya ma n"ihe ngosi otu. Ya na di ya, Dr
Bland, nwèrè ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị; di na nwunye ahụ chepụtara ma wuo ụlọ nke ha na Kalmia Road na Washington
Bland nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'ụlọ ndị agadi na Washington. E liri ya na Fort Lincoln Cemetery mgbè emesịrị ememe olili ozu na Dumbarton Chapel na ogige Mahadum Howard.
